business.headline: Explained: Why MTNL share price rose 18% todayOver the past year, the stock has gained 18.61%. Year-to-date (YTD), the stock has declined by 15.66%. In the last six months, the stock has dropped 23.25%  and in the last three months, it has fallen 25.95%.

Who is Lip-Bu Tan, industry veteran named Intel CEO?Lip-Bu Tan, who officially takes over on March 18, has extensive experience in the chip sector and is known for investing in promising tech startups.

Explained: Why Sensex, Nifty are giving up early gains almost every dayStock market today: Despite multiple signals pointing to a strong opening, the Sensex and Nifty couldn't hold on to early gains. Right now, they are barely 0.10% higher.
Sensex, Nifty gain momentum on inflation relief, IndusInd Bank falls 2%The S&P BSE Sensex gained 250.89 points to 74,280.65, while the NSE Nifty50 added 59.70 points to 22,530.20 as of 10 AM.

Not freebies, job creation will omit poverty from India: Narayana MurthyInfosys co-founder Narayana Murthy has slammed the freebies of culture, saying that job creation by innovative entrepreneurs will help eliminate poverty from India.

Stocks to watch today: Infosys, BEL, Ola Electric, Tata Motors and moreStocks to watch today (March 13): Infosys, Tata Motors, and Bharat Electronics Limited are likely to be in focus today as domestic markets gear up for a mildly positive start.

Will Sensex, Nifty recover today? 3 things to know ahead of stock market openingStock market opening prediction today: Sensex and Nifty are likely to open higher after positive US and domestic retail inflation data.

Income tax deadline: Only 3 days left to pay last instalment of advance taxMaking timely payments is crucial when it comes to tax compliance to avoid penalties and interest. Also, meeting deadlines ensures last-minute stress and a smooth tax filing process.

Wall Street on edge: Inflation eases, but global retaliation hits stocks hardAfter jumping to a big early gain on an encouraging inflation update, Wall Street gave back much of it after other countries announced their retaliations following President Donald Trump's latest escalation in his trade war.

Wall Street opens higher as softer inflation data boosts investor confidenceAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 rose 52.8 points, or 0.95%, to 5,624.84 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up by 144.0 points, or 0.35%, to 41,577.5. The Nasdaq Composite also witnessed a rise of 275.3 points, or 1.58%, to 17,711.41.
Equity mutual fund inflows fall 26% in February amid market volatilityMarket fluctuations impacted mutual fund inflows across categories, with equity and hybrid funds seeing a decline.

Retail inflation eases to 7-month low of 3.61% in FebruaryRetail inflation in February has cooled to a seven-month low, and it has also fallen below the RBI's medium-term target for the first time in six months.
TDS rules from April 1: Higher tax-free limits on FD interest, lotteryTo benefit senior citizens, the government has doubled the TDS threshold for interest income from Rs 50,000 to Rs 1 lakh.

Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower as IT stocks tumble; Infosys falls over 4%The S&P BSE Sensex ended 72.56 points lower at 74,029.76, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 27.40 points lower at 22,470.50. All the other broader market indices also ended in negative territory.

Temasek takes a bit of Haldiram's, buys 10% stake for $1 billion: ReportTemasek, which has already invested in Manipal Hospitals and fast-food giant Devyani International (operator of KFC and Pizza Hut in India), is now looking to cash in on the growing snacks market with its Haldiram's bet.

Air India rolls out premium economy fares starting at Rs 599 for a limited timeThese premium economy fares are above regular economy fares on domestic flights for a limited time. Prices vary based on routes and demand.

India's top 7 billionaires lose $34 billion amid stock market slumpMukesh Ambani, India's richest person, lost $3.13 billion this year, though he still remains India's richest man with a net worth of $87.5 billion.

Sensex falls over 400 points. 3 factors behind today's stock market slumpStock market today: At around 12:42 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 439.77 points to 73,662.55 and the Nifty50 was trading 150.50 points lower at 22,347.40.

Why are some investors choosing fixed deposits over SIPs?Many stock market experts suggest that mid-cap and small-cap stocks are currently expensive, which has triggered a correction in the last six months.

Explained: Why IndusInd Bank share price is rising today after 27% crashIndusIndi Bank stock price: The stock surged nearly 14% from its intraday low, climbing to Rs 690 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), breaking a five-day losing streak.At around 12 pm, shares of the company were up 3.18% to Rs 676.80 on the NSE.

5 billionaires at Trump's swearing-in see over $200 billion vanish in weeks   The start of Donald Trump's second term has been brutal for some of the world's richest billionaires, including those present at his swearing-in ceremony.

Jio and Airtel sign deals with Elon Musk's Starlink for satellite internet in IndiaJio and Airtel have signed separate agreements with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet to India. The partnerships aim to provide high-speed broadband to remote and underserved areas. Starlink's service rollout depends on government approval. The deals could improve connectivity for education, healthcare, and businesses in regions lacking fibre-optic infrastructure. Starlink uses a constellation of 6,900 satellites for global broadband coverage.

Reliance shares gain after Jio's deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX for StarlinkRIL shares were up over 1% in early trade but gave up some gains due to market volatility. Around 10 am, the stock was trading 0.35% higher at Rs 1,251.50.
Infosys, TCS, Wipro: Why are major IT stocks falling today?At around 9:50 am, Infosys shares were down 3.5% and Wipro fell over 3.35%. HCLTech was down over 2.4% and TCS tumbled nearly 2%.

Sensex, Nifty swing between gains and losses in volatile session; IT stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex, which was up nearly 300 points in early trade, fell 91.43 points to trade at 74,010.37 around 9:30 am. The Nifty50 also fell 40.60 points to trade at 22,457.30.

After Airtel, Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Stock market today: Will Trump's latest tariff threat impact Dalal Street today? Stock market opening today: While domestic stocks remain under pressure, experts suggested that Dalal Street is unlikely to feel the impact of the ongoing weakness in US stock markets.

US stock markets remain under pressure after Monday's big crash. 3 things to knowThe S&P 500 dropped as low as 5,528.41, marking a 10% fall from its February 19 record of 6,144.15—hitting what traders call a "market correction."

Wall Street sinks amid Trump's tariff hike on Canadian metalsThe US stock market tumbled further after Trump doubled tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum, with the Dow plunging 554 points amid rising economic uncertainty and fears of a prolonged trade war.

US stock market: Wall Street indices remain under pressure amid slowdown fearsAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 73.8 points, or 0.18%, to 41,837.95. The S&P 500 lost 10.9 points, or 0.19%, to 5,603.65, while the Nasdaq Composite was the only major index that recovered slightly in early trade.

Donald Trump to meet CEOs of America's biggest firms after Wall Street crashPresident Donald Trump is expected to speak with around 100 CEOs at a regular meeting of the Business Roundtable in Washington, an influential group of CEOs leading major US companies from Apple to JPMorgan Chase and Walmart.

Looking for fixed deposit with up to 9% interest? Check these small finance banksUnity Small Finance Bank offers 9% per annum for a 1001-day fixed deposit and 7.85% per annum for a one-year fixed deposit.

Why did Elon Musk's wealth shrink by $29 billion in a single day? Tesla's struggles have had a major impact on Musk's financial losses. In the past two months, Tesla's stock has fallen by 35%,wiping out $400 billion in market value.
Airtel signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink internet to IndiaThe deal depends on SpaceX getting approval from authorities to sell Starlink services in India.
Sensex ends marginally lower, Nifty in green; IndusInd Bank crashes 27%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 12.85 points to end at 74,102.32, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 37.60 points to close at 22,497.90.

UPI and RuPay merchant charges may return: What it means for youThe government is planning to introduce a tiered pricing system, where bigger businesses pay higher charges while small businesses pay reduced charges.

Elon Musk says balancing DOGE and CEO roles is tough as Tesla shares slideElon Musk has been actively involved in Tesla, SpaceX, X (formerly Twitter), and xAI, along with his inclination to working with the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).

IndusInd Bank share price crashes 27%: Buy, hold or sell?IndusInd Bank stock price: At the closing bell, IndusInd Bank shares were down 27.17% to Rs 655.95 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), marking their worst trading session ever.
DA hike: How much can central government employees expect?The expected hike is likely to benefit around 12 million central government employees and pensioners under the 7th Pay Commission.

US stock market crash: Why Sensex, Nifty aren't feeling the heatThe S&P BSE Sensex was down less than 170 points at around 11:35 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fluctuated between gains and losses. The 50-share index was down barely 20 points but showed no signs of panic. Broader market indices also stayed flat as volatility spiked.

entertainment.headline: Maui Police chief accused of covering up alleged Diddy, Odell Beckham Jr. assaultMaui Police Chief John Pelletier is accused of covering up an alleged gang rape involving Sean 'Diddy' Combs, Odell Beckham Jr, and Druski. The lawsuit claims Pelletier attempted to conceal the 2018 assault.

More photos from Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal's Haldi out. Seen yet?Prajakta Koli's friend has shared more photos from her and Vrishank Khanal's Haldi ceremony on Instagram. Check out the pictures here.

Panchayat actor Durgesh Kumar 'struggling' despite hit projects in 25-year careerActor Durgesh Kumar, known for his roles in Panchayat and Laapataa Ladies, shared that he still struggles to find significant roles despite his success. He said that he still has to chase casting directors for auditions despite recognition in his 25-year-long career in the industry.

TV actor Aditi Sharma responds to allegations of cheating from estranged husbandAditi Sharma refuted her estranged husband Abhineet Kaushik's allegations of infidelity, asserting that their marital issues stem from his insecurities and not her actions. She also claimed that she faced 'serious problems' in the four months of marriage.

Kim So-hyun's relationship with Kim Sae-ron confirmed by Dispatch. DetailsA news report by Dispatch shed light on the controversy surrounding Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron's alleged past relationship and the financial and emotional turmoil Kim Sae-ron faced, which might have led up to her tragic death.
K-pop group NMIXX makes a bold comeback with High HorseK-pop group NMIXX is making a bold comeback with High Horse. And this time, they have a surprise for their desi fans.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

TV actor Aditi Sharma's rumoured boyfriend breaks silence amid infidelity allegationApollena actor Aditi Sharma's co-star Samarthya Gupta has denied rumours of an affair with her, calling the allegations baseless and harmful. Aditi's husband had alleged infidelity.

Kim Sae-ron's unpublished statement emerges after dating rumours with Kim Soo-hyunAlmost a month after South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's death, her aunt has alleged K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun was in a relationship with Sae-ron, and that they began dating when she was only a minor.

Did Ekta Kapoor just take a jibe at Ram Kapoor in a video about Ozempic?Filmmaker Ekta Kapoor on Tuesday shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen talking about her weight gain and if she should follow artificial methods to lose some weight. There was also a Ram Kapoor connection.

Ibrahim Ali Khan re-posts Nadaaniyan's poor ratings, puzzled fans reactIbrahim Ali Khan reposted his film, Nadaaniyan's low ratings. Fans were puzzled by the actor's move in highlighting the film's poor performance.

Singer Ne-Yo introduces his four girlfriends from his polyamorous relationship In a candid revelation, American singer and songwriter Ne-Yo introduced his four girlfriends, embracing a polyamorous lifestyle. The musician shared insights into his unique relationship dynamic online, calling it his 'pyramid'.

Tapu-Sonu wedding in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah…? Fans say 'must be Bhide's dream'A promo of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah shows Tapu marrying Sonu, leaving fans in shock. Many speculate it's a dream sequence, as Bhide disapproves of Tapu. The sitcom, India's longest-running, first aired in 2008.

Exclusive: Louis Tomlinson on India debut, love for Indian food, and solo career Louis Tomlinson, former One Direction member, embarked on his first solo performance in India at Lollapalooza 2025. He expressed excitement and a fondness for Indian culture, particularly its cuisine, during an exclusive interview.

Telugu actor-politician Posani Krishna Murali granted bail in all casesActor and YSRCP member Posani Krishna Murali has been granted bail in all cases. The YSRCP accused Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu-led government of filing 17 cases against him as part of a political vendetta.

SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

Daredevil Born Again breaks streaming records with 7.5 million views Latest Marvel series, Daredevil Born Again, has set a new streaming record with 7.5 million views in just five days. The series marks the return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil, alongside a mix of returning and new cast members.

general news.headline: Learnt to hide gold from YouTube, never smuggled before: Ranya Rao to officialsIn her statement to the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), Ranya Rao explained her frequent foreign travels and how she smuggled the gold. She also said this was her first time she had smuggled gold from Dubai.

UK woman raped by 'friend' in Delhi, molested in hotel lift by another manThe incident happened in south-west Delhi's Mahipalpur area. According to police, the victim said she met the accused on social media.

Blocking Ukraine ceasefire would be disastrous for Russia, Trump warns PutinWhile Ukraine has agreed to the US-proposed 30-day ceasefire plan, Russia stated that it is still 'studying' the proposal and awaiting a briefing from the US regarding the plan.

Love these socks: Trump teases JD Vance during White House meet in viral videoUS President Donald Trump seemed distracted during a St. Patrick's Day breakfast with Irish Prime Minister Micheál Martin at the White House because of Vice President JD Vance's shamrock-patterned socks.
What is the skin reset trend, and does your skin need it?Skin reset is a mindful approach to skincare that focuses on doing less, not more.

SpaceX delays mission to bring back astronauts Sunita Williams, Butch WilmoreNasa said the Crew-10 launch was scrubbed due to a hydraulic system issue, and the next available launch opportunity is no earlier than Thursday 7.26 pm EDT. This means that the Crew-9 mission would depart the space station on March 17.

Russia lays out demands for Ukraine ceasefire as US team en route for talksIt is not clear what exactly Moscow included on its list or whether it is willing to engage in peace talks with Kyiv prior to their acceptance. Russian and American officials discussed the terms during in-person and virtual conversations over the last three weeks.

Pak says train siege is over: Hostages freed, 30 insurgents, 28 soldiers killedThe Pakistan Army said all 33 Baloch insurgents who hijacked a train in Balochistan have been eliminated, and all the hostages were freed after an intense military operation.
Total lunar eclipse: These cities will witness Moon turn blood redThe total lunar eclipse on March 14 will occur during the full moon phase, which coincides with the culmination of Holi celebrations.

I was naive: Wife of Palestinian Columbia student thought he was safe from arrestKhalil was born and raised in a Palestinian refugee camp in Syria and came to the US on a student visa in 2022, getting his US permanent residency green card last year.
Sensex, Nifty gain momentum on inflation relief, IndusInd Bank falls 2%The S&P BSE Sensex gained 250.89 points to 74,280.65, while the NSE Nifty50 added 59.70 points to 22,530.20 as of 10 AM.

Imtiaz Ali on Jab We Met sequel after Kareena, Shahid's reunion at IIFA 2025Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor Khan reunited at the IIFA 2025 press conference, sparking nostalgia among fans. The meeting reignited talks of a sequel to their hit film Jab We Met, though director Imtiaz Ali isn't planning one.

Gukesh shaves head at Tirumala temple after World Championship successD Gukesh, who won the World Chess Championship last year in Singapore after beating Ding Liren, sought blessings at the Tirumala Temple in Andhra Pradesh by shaving his head.

IT Minister welcomes Starlink to India, later deletes the tweetA day after Jio and Airtel announced partnership with Elon Musk's Starlink satellite internet system, IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw welcomed the service in India with a tweet. While this gave a hint that government approval for Starlink, a service run by SpaceX, would come soon, the minister later deleted the tweet.

After praising Kerala, Shashi Tharoor's selfie with Pinarayi VijayanCongress MP Shashi Tharoor shared selfies with Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and Governor Rajendra Arlekar during a dinner in Delhi. The post comes weeks after his praise for the Left government upset Congress leaders.

Trump vows further tariffs as EU, Canada counter those already imposedTrump said he would impose additional penalties if the EU follows through with its plan to enact counter tariffs on some US goods next month.

Job scams to digital slavery, how India battles China's cyber mafiaChinese cybercrime has evolved into an industrialised operation running from Southeast Asian nations, scamming people around the world through thousands of 'digital slaves'

Sambhal's Jama Masjid among 10 mosques to be covered during Holi processionIn Uttar Pradesh's Sambhal, 10 mosques, including the historic Jama Masjid, will be covered with plastic sheets and tarpaulins that will fall along the route of a Holi procession.

Kanpur ACP Mohsin Khan, accused of sexual harassment by IIT-scholar, suspendedThe action came after a report filed into the case by the Special Investigation Team (SIT). The Kanpur Police Commissioner sent the report to the state government.

Not freebies, job creation will omit poverty from India: Narayana MurthyInfosys co-founder Narayana Murthy has slammed the freebies of culture, saying that job creation by innovative entrepreneurs will help eliminate poverty from India.

Extreme weather will be your new normal in 2025: Here's whyIf 2024 was bad, 2025 will be no better, with an early summer already predicted in India, even higher temperatures than last year and frequent heat-waves

Stranger Things actor Sadie Sink joins Tom Holland in Spider Man 4The makers of the next installment in the Spider-Man franchise have cast actor Sadie Sink alongside Tom Holland. Sink is best known for her performance in Netflix's Stranger Things.

Karnataka withdraws CID probe into Ranya Rao gold smuggling caseThe CID probe into the state police's role in the gold smuggling case involving Kannada actor Ranya Rao was withdrawn by the Karnataka government on Wednesday.

IITs, JNU among 9 Indian institutes in top-50 spots in QS subject-wise rankingsNine Indian universities secured positions in the top 50 of the QS subject-wise rankings, with IITs, IIMs, and JNU featuring, though some saw a drop in ranking compared to last year.

Ranbir Kapoor invited me to his office, praised my art: Delhi artistBollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor recently invited a Delhi-based artist, Abhay Sehgal, to his office after being impressed by his work. Sehgal shared a picture with the actor and described the experience as a dream come true.

The Diplomat's Sadia Khateeb fell for John Abraham's Kabir in Dhoom as a kidSadia Khateeb talked about her childhood crush on John Abraham's Dhoom character, Kabir, revealing she told friends he was her boyfriend. The Diplomat, co-starring John, releases on March 14.

Govinda on 2008 slap incident: Man demanded Rs 3-4 crore to settle caseGovinda recalled his 2008 slap case, revealing the man demanded Rs 3–4 crore. He recorded proof and sent it to court. The case was settled in 2017, but he regrets Bollywood never supported him.

Not Rajamouli, Odisha leader confirms Mahesh Babu, Prithviraj, Priyanka's castingOdisha Deputy Chief Minister Pravati Parida confirmed information about SS Rajamouli's upcoming film, SSMB 29, with Mahesh Babu. Parida confirmed Prithviraj Sukumaran and Priyanka Chopra's casting in the film.

sports.headline: IPL 2025 RCB Preview: Can season 18 realise Virat Kohli's title dream?Season 18 of the IPL aligns with Virat Kohli's iconic jersey number, fuelling hopes that Royal Challengers Bengaluru's revamped squad under Rajat Patidar's leadership could finally deliver the elusive title victory.

Real Madrid's Ancelotti takes VAR's side on Alvarez penalty controversyLos Blancos coach Carlo Ancelotti backed VAR's decision to disallow Julian Alvarez's penalty after double touch, securing Real Madrid's dramatic shootout victory over Atletico Madrid in the Champions League.

Always wanted to be around him: Sanju Samson on respect for MS DhoniSanju Samson said that he always tries to be around MS Dhoni, trying to take advice from the legendary Indian wicketkeeper. Samson will return to competitive cricket in the IPL 2025 after his finger injury.

Carlos Alcaraz eases into quarters, Belinda Bencic stuns Coco GauffIndian Wells 2025: Carlos Alcaraz kept alive his hopes of a three-peat after beating Grigor Dimitrov in straight sets. Switzerland's Belinda Bencic set up a clash with Madison Keys after beating 2023 US Open champion Coco Gauff.

Player of Rohit Sharma's stature should get to decide his future: Dilip VengasarkarFormer India captain Dilip Vengasarkar said that players like Rohit Sharma should get to decide their future on their own. Rohit recently played a match-winning innings of 76 (83) in the final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025.

Pakistan player Talha Waheed smashes record for most serves in a minutePakistan's Talha Waheed etched his name in the Guinness Book of World Records for registering most tennis serves in a minute. He broke American John Perry's record from 2019.
Kobe Bryant's former players remember the NBA legendKobe Bryant's former basketball players recall their time with the basketball legend on the fifth anniversary of his death.

Puja on the pitch: Special prayer marks start of KKR's training at Eden GardensIPL 2025: Defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders began their training camp at Eden Gardens, Kolkata with a special puja. Captain Ajinkya Rahane and Eden Gardens curator Sujan Mukherjee performed the rituals on Wednesday.

NBA: Milwaukee star Junior Bridgeman dies at 71Junior Bridgeman, a basketball standout, starred for the NBA's Milwaukee Bucks and then launched an even more successful career as a businessman with stakes in restaurants, publishing and the Bucks franchise, died at 71 on Tuesday.

WPL Eliminator: Mumbai Indians vs Gujarat Giants live streaming and match guideMumbai Indians and Gujarat Giants are set to take on each other in the Eliminator fixture of the Women's Premier League 2025 in Mumbai. The winner will face Delhi Capitals in the final on March 15.
NFL: Michael Pierce announces retirementBaltimore Ravens defensive tackle Michael Pierce announced his retirement Wednesday after nine seasons in the NFL.

MS Dhoni sings with wife Sakshi, poses with Gambhir at Pant's sister's weddingMS Dhoni was seen grooving to a popular Bollywood song alongside his wife, Sakshi. The former India captain and Gautam Gambhir also posed together with Rishabh Pant's sister and her husband in Mussoorie.

March Madness 2025: Date, Time, and How to Watch the NCAA Tournament Bracket RevealThe NCAA Tournament 2025 brackets will be posted on Selection Sunday, March 16, 2025.

How three-pointers evolved as Stephen Curry nears historic 4,000 markStephen Curry is only two points away from reaching the milestone of 4,000 three-pointers, and he will be the first NBA player to achieve such a feat, currently, he is at 3,998.

Spoke to Jos Buttler, told him I am still not over releasing him: Sanju SamsonIPL 2025: Sanju Samson said he met Jos Buttler over dinner during England's tour of India and spoke to him about Rajasthan Royals' decision to release him. Buttler will play for Gujarat Titans in the new season.

NBA: Cleveland Cavaliers become sixth team to win 15 straight matchesNBA: The Cleveland Cavaliers extended their winning streak to 15, defeating the Brooklyn Nets 109-104. They secured a playoff spot, clinched the Central Division title, and now hold a 55-10 record.

Mahmudullah calls time on international career after Champions Trophy debacleBangladesh cricketer Mahmudullah Riyad announced his retirement from international cricket following his team's dismal performance in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025.

India's absence in WTC final to cost Lord's 4 million pounds in revenueIndia's non-qualification for the World Test Championship final 2025 is likely to cost nearly 4 million pounds in revenue, according to reports. India finished third in the WTC cycle 2023-25 and hence failed to qualify.

Pakistan official didn't deserve to be in final, ICC showed us mirror: Kamran AkmalFormer Pakistan cricketer Kamran Akmal has said that no one from Pakistan deserved to be present on the stage during the final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. BCCI officials, ICC Chairman Jay Shah and New Zealand Cricket CEO were on stage to present accolades to the two finalists, India and New Zealand.

PV Sindhu crashes out in first round after tough loss to Korea's Kim Ga EunAll England Open 2025: PV Sindhu suffered an early exit from the prestigious tournament in Birmingham, losing her first-round match in women's singles to lower-ranked Kim Ga Eun of South Korea.
Syed Abid Ali, former all-rounder, dies at 83, Sunil Gavaskar mournsFormer India cricketer Syed Abid Ali died aged 83 on Wednesday. The Hyderabad cricketer played 29 Tests and five ODIs for India.

Watch: Gautam Gambhir reaches Mussorie to attend Rishabh Pant's sister's weddingIndian cricket team head coach Gautam Gambhir reached Mussorie to attend Rishabh Pant's sister Sakshi's wedding. Gambhir recently guided India to Champions Trophy 2025 victory.

Hardik Pandya hungry for more titles after Champions Trophy win: Need 5-6 trophiesStar India all-rounder Hardik Pandya expressed his desire of winning 5-6 more ICC trophies after their Champions Trophy 2025 triumph. India beat New Zealand by four wickets in the final to secure third Champions Trophy title.

IPL 2025 GT Preview: Revamped Titans look to get back to playoff dreamlandWith a new look side, filled with some big names, Gujarat Titans will be looking to get back into Playoff contention in IPL 2025. Shubman Gill, Rashid Khan will once again key for the Titans as they look to claim another title.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
